application.title: Covidcode FOPH
application.organization.name: Federal Office of Information Technology, Systems and Telecommunication FOITT
code.title: Authentication code
code.instruction: Please provide this authentication code to the person who tested positive.
code.hint: The code will be deleted as soon as the window it closed.
help.title: Help
help.text1: If the person who tested positive hasn’t shown any symptoms, please type in the date of testing. The incubation period is calculated automatically.
help.text2: Based on the date of infection a single-use authentication code is generated.
help.text3: Pass on the code to your patient, leaving out the spaces, so that they can enter it into the Tracing App. This code is valid for 24 hours.
help.text4: Authentication codes are not stored locally. This means a new code has to be generated, if the patient requires a new one.
home.text2: You are now on the website where persons of the contact management can generate an authorization code to allow tracing of people infected with the new Coronavirus
home.info: More information about tracing people infected with the new Coronavirus
home.login: Access for persons of the Contact Management
home.physician: Further information for cantonal physicians on the onboarding process
home.download: You want to download the Tracing App? You can do so via the official pages:
i18n.validation.matDatepickerMax: Date cannot be in the future
i18n.validation.matDatepickerMin: Date cannot be older than 4 weeks
i18n.validation.required: Please enter a valid date format
